name: phenyl_benzoate
source: Aldrich Chemical Company; Aldrich Catalog-Handbook of Fine Chemicals; Milwaukee; WI; 1984.
Reason: 1,2-propanediol base melting point is around 30 degrees Celsius. The additional functional groups and structural features in phenyl benzoate will affect its melting point: (1) Two phenyl groups, which could each add approximately +20 due to the increase in molecular weight and rigidity of the structure.
